trans-unit.source: Represents a logger that forwards events to a central logger (e.g ConsoleLogger) residing on the parent node.
trans-unit.target: 表示将事件转发到中央记录器 （例如 ConsoleLogger） 记录器驻留在父节点上。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that determines how a node logger to forwards messages to the central logger.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个属性，确定如何节点记录器消息转发到中央记录器。

trans-unit.source: Returns a property that determines how a node logger to forwards messages to the central logger.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个属性，确定如何节点记录器消息转发到中央记录器。

trans-unit.source: Forward this event to the central logger.
trans-unit.target: 将此事件转发到中央记录器。

trans-unit.source: Signs up the console logger to log the given build events.
trans-unit.target: 注册控制台记录器记录以记录给定的生成事件。

trans-unit.source: The event source for build events.
trans-unit.target: 用于生成事件的事件源。

trans-unit.source: Signs up the console logger for all build events.
trans-unit.target: 注册所有控制台记录器记录生成事件。

trans-unit.source: The event source for build events.
trans-unit.target: 用于生成事件的事件源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置节点的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ID of the node.
Gets or sets a switch that determines whether to suppress the output of the errors and warnings summary at the end of a build.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置确定是否禁止显示错误和警告摘要生成末尾的输出的交换机。

trans-unit.source: Returns a switch that determines whether to suppress the output of the errors and warnings summary at the end of a build.
trans-unit.target: 返回确定是否禁止显示错误和警告摘要生成末尾的输出的交换机。

trans-unit.source: Called when the build engine is finished with this logger.
trans-unit.target: 当生成引擎已完成，但此记录器时调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of detail to show in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示在事件日志中的详细信息级别。

trans-unit.source: Returns the level of detail to show in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 返回要显示在事件日志中的详细信息的级别。
